member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for transforming and manipulating values.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts the string by hashing and returns another string in a hexadecimal format.
member.param: The string value you wish to encrypt.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string value to a boolean value and returns it.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 16-bit signed integer equivalent and returns it.
member.returns: A 16-bit signed integer representation of the input string or the default value 0 if the input parameter is invalid.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 32-bit signed integer equivalent and returns it.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer representation of the input string or the default value 0 if the input parameter is invalid.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 64-bit signed integer equivalent and returns it.
member.returns: A 64-bit signed integer representation of the input string or the default value 0 if the input parameter is invalid.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a date to its DateTime equivalent and returns it.
member.returns: A DateTime representation of the input string or DateTime.MinValue if the input parameter is invalid.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the first letter of a string to capital and returns the changed string.
member.returns: A string with capitalized first letter or the input parameter if it is null or empty string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the substring between two specified substrings or an empty string if some of the method parameters is invalid.
member.param: The string from which substring will be extracted.
Substring in the input, located before the target substring.
Substring in the input, located after the target substring.
Index of the input string where the search starts from.
member.returns: A string value or empty string in case of invalid input parameters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts any cyrillic letters in a string to their latin phonetic transcription representations.
member.returns: A string with latin letters representing the phonetic transcription of the input text.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts any latin letters in a string to their cyrillic keyboard input representations.
member.returns: A string with cyrillic letters representing the cyrillic keyboard representations of the input text.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a valid user name.
member.returns: A string containing only latin letters, digits, underscores or dots.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a valid file name.
member.returns: A string containing only latin letters, digits, underscores, hyphens or dots.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a substring with a specified length starting from the beginning of the input string.
member.param: String from which to extract the first characters.
member.returns: A string containing the specified number of characters from the beginning of the input or the input string if charsCount parameter is invalid.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the file extension of a specified string input or an empty string if the input is not a valid file name.
member.returns: A string - the file extension or an empty string if the input is not a valid file name.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the content type as a string value according to given file extension.
member.returns: The content type, according to the given file extension as a string or "application/octet-stream" if the file extension is unknown.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to the corresponding byte array of its characters and returns it.
member.returns: A byte array that is copied from the bytes in the char array representation of the input string.
